columns.name: country
columns.description: Code country as MX = Mexico and CL = Chile

columns.name: date
columns.description: Issued date of the order in format yyyy-mm-dd

columns.name: dateTimestamp
columns.description: Issued date of the order in timestamp format

columns.name: month
columns.description: First day of the issued month of the product in format yyyy-mm-01

columns.name: disbursementDate
columns.description: Date in which the orderInvoice was disbursed in format yyyy-mm-dd

columns.name: product
columns.description: Code for the product as PP = Early payment, FD = Direct financing, PF = Financed payments and PY = Non Financed payments

columns.name: orderStatus
columns.description: Order status name as it appears in BackOffice
